# How to use orientation

## create your app

```ts
import { Mobile } from '@site/ui/Mobile'
import { useOrientation } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const [alpha, beta, gamma] = useOrientation()
        return <Mobile alpha={alpha} beta={beta} gamma={gamma} />
}
```

import { Mobile } from '@site/ui/Mobile'
import { useOrientation } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const [alpha, beta, gamma] = useOrientation()
        return <Mobile alpha={alpha} beta={beta} gamma={gamma} />
}

<App />
